document.masterDocTitle: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

subSubSection.paragraph:
NEW
RECORDS
: BM 11 , BM 13 , BM 14 , BM 16 , BM 17 , BM 26 , BM 27 , BM 28 , BM 31 , BM 38 , BM 39 , BM 40 , BM 52 , BM 53 , BM 54 , BM 55 , BM 57 , BM 63 , BM 65 , BM 66 , BM 92 , BM 98 , BM 99 , BM 101 .
OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Aricidea (Aricidea) mutabilis Laubier & Ramos, 1974
;
Aricidea fauveli Hartman, 1957
.

REMARKS : Following the consideration of Castelli ( 1987 ) the specimens previously determined as
Aricidea fauveli Hartman, 1957
by Amoureux ( 1979, 1981 ),
Vrišer et al. ( 1981 )
, Zavodnik ( 1979 ), Gillet ( 1985 / 1986 ),
Ambrogi et al. ( 1987 )
,
Zavodnik and Vidaković ( 1987 )
,
Parisi et al. ( 1990 )
,
Zahtila ( 1997 )
in the NA sea are attributed to
A. assimilis Tebble, 1959 (Castelli 1987 )
.

Aricidea (Acmira) catherinae Laubier, 1967
DISTRIBUTION : NA , CA, SA.

NEW
RECORDS
: BM 11 , BM 12 , BM 13 , BM 14 , BM 15 , BM 16 , BM 17 , BM 18 , BM 19 , BM 21 , BM 22 , BM 26 , BM 27 , BM 28 , BM 40 , BM 46 , BM 52 , BM 53 , BM 54 , BM 55 , BM 56 , BM 60 , BM 61 , BM 63 , BM 64 , BM 67 , BM 73 , BM 92 , BM 99 .

LITERATURE
RECORDS
:
Katzmann 1973 a
,
1973 b
,
1973 f
;
Katzmann & Laubier 1975
;
Amoureux 1983 c
;
Katzmann 1983
; Castelli 1987 ;
Požar-Domac 1994
;
Cantone & Di Pietro 2002
;
Castelli et al . 2008
.
NEW
RECORDS
: BM 14 , BM 15 , BM 16 , BM 17 , BM 18 , BM 19 , BM 21 , BM 67 .

LITERATURE
RECORDS
:
Katzmann 1973 a
,
1973 e
;
Katzmann & Laubier 1975
;
Amoureux 1983 b
; Castelli 1987 ;
Županović & Jardas 1989
;
Požar-Domac 1994
;
Cantone & Di Pietro 2002
;
Castelli et al . 2008
.
NEW
RECORDS
: BM 20 , BM 28 , BM 34 , BM 53 , BM 55 .

OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Aricidea punctata Katzmann, 1973
;
Aricidea punctifera Katzmann, 1973
;
Aricidea cf. neosuecica Hartman, 1965
.

REMARKS : Following conclusions of
Katzmann and Laubier ( 1975 )
, the specimens determined as
Aricidea punctata Katzmann, 1973
, a taxon described from the Adriatic Sea (
Katzman 1973 e
), as well as those reported as
Aricidea cf. neosuecica Hartman, 1965
, should be referred to
A. simonae
.
